intro:
Race fast. Smash harder.
No rules. No mercy.
Only the last car survives.
description:
Crash The Car: Death Race
In this high-octane demolition racer, there’s only one rule—destroy anything in your path! Pick your car, arm it with powerful weapons, and tear through dangerous tracks packed with traps, obstacles, and relentless rival drivers.
Speed alone won’t win the race—you’ll need sharp reflexes, deadly aim, and a taste for chaos to survive. Smash opponents off the road, dodge incoming attacks, and trigger spectacular explosions as you fight to be the last car standing.
Upgrade your vehicle, unlock new battle machines, and take on increasingly challenging events in your quest to become the ultimate death race champion.
Features:
Single-player combat racing mayhem
Multiple vehicles to unlock and upgrade
Weapons, power-ups, and explosive destruction

Adrenaline-pumping tracks filled with hazards
